name: Tammy and the smiling balloon
description:
Tammy and her smiling balloon went to play at the horse carousel. It is a lovely day with open sky, and the "Happy" sign makes everyone around so happy. 

The watch comes with shocking Pink leather strap, and inserted into a box, as shown in the picture.

This watch is first painted by hand and then transformed into an illustration to become a part of this special wrist watch.

This is a perfect gift to give someone you love.

name: Girl on the Beach
description:
Wow, what a day on the beach. Dia took her cute yellow bag and went for a day on the beach. There was this yellow sea star and a palm tree, and a big yellow sun was coming down to end a perfect day.

The watch comes with Orange leather strap, and inserted into a box, as shown in the pictures.

This watch is first hand painted by hand and then transformed into an illustration to become a part of this special watch.

This is a perfect gift to give someone you love.

name: Girl and White Hat
description:
Ava is strumming a happy tune on her guitar and her cat, Butterscotch, just might start meowing along! It’s that time of day when the sun is just starting to set, casting a glowing and beautiful pink light on everything. Ava’s pretty music floats throughout the city park and the families in the nearby apartment buildings smile and listen through their open windows as they eat dinner. Summertime in the city is a joyful time, indeed! 

This charming hand-painted watch comes with a light pink strap to remind you of your favorite urban sunsets and arrives secure in a box. A perfect gift for anyone you love!

name: Girl and Boy Riding Bike
description:
Bryant and Beatrice are going for a bike ride around the countryside. They had planned to go straight to their favorite lake for an afternoon swim, but Beatrice spotted a balloon stand on the way and they just had to stop and buy some! Their kitten friend, Sugar Cookie, is looking forward to sunbathing by the lake’s shore. From over the nearby hill, lovely music can be heard. That will make swimming even more fun!

This charming hand-painted watch comes with a handmade brown woven leather strap AND a regular brown leather strap for a replacement, all inserted safely in a little box. The straps can be switched at any watch shop or at home if you know how to do it. It would be a wonderful and thoughtful gift for a loved one!

name: Bride and Groom Getting Married & Motorcycle
description:
Liam and Lily have just been married and are about to hit the open highway on their new Vespa! Their exuberance is shared by their dog, Lucky, who of course will be going along for the adventure. The newlyweds will ride all the way to this one place they had always dreamed of, with the wind in their hair and love all around them! What a perfect day! Congratulations, you two!

This beautiful hand-painted watch comes with a white leather strap and arrives secure in a little box. It would be a great bridal shower or anniversary gift!
